snippet.title: Cloak and Dasher - Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Insanely fast, wildly fun! Guide Cloak in his search for riches through a maze of ruins full of deadly traps and weird monsters in this 2D flip-screen platformer. Fluid gameplay, simple controls and short challenging levels that can be completed in seconds — if you are quick and skilled enough!

Cloak and Dasher releases on Steam Early Access on February 25th. Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1114620/Cloak_and_Dasher/

¡Increíblemente rápido, salvajemente divertido! Guía a Cloak en su búsqueda de tesoros a través de un laberinto de ruinas lleno de trampas mortales y extraños monstruos en este plataformas 2D. Gameplay fluido, controles sencillos y niveles tan cortos como desafiantes que pueden completarse en segundos... ¡si eres lo bastante rápido y hábil!
